se.wizard.laststand

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • se.wizard.laststand.GameActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameSurfaceView.OnSurfaceCreatedListener, UpgradeView.OnUpgradedListener

    public class GameActivity
extends Activity
implements GameSurfaceView.OnSurfaceCreatedListener, UpgradeView.OnUpgradedListener
    An activity that runs a gameengine and renders it using a GameSurfaceView.
